title: A Jig: The River Cree
creator_credit: Thames and Clyde Film Company and Stanley Russell
brief_description: Introduction to a traditional Scottish dance the jig, set to the music of “The River Cree. Demonstrates the steps and movements of the four couples in a complete jig.
